arts.ttl: Champions League | Ajax 0-2 Inter: Thuram double conquers Amsterdam
arts.sum: Marcus Thuram made sure Lautaro Martinez was not missed with a pair of headers to give Inter a big 2-0 Champions League victory away to Ajax.
